Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Villa Covelo in Poio (Rias Baixas), you'll be close to Mogor Beach and Monasterio de Poio. This hotel is within the vicinity of Playa de Areas and Monastery of Santa Maria in Armenteira.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes, and both irons/ironing boards and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Villa Covelo. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Villa Covelo. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mogor Beach - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Monasterio de Poio - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi
Playa de Areas - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Monastery of Santa Maria in Armenteira - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Campo de Golf Meis - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Caeira Archaeological Centre - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Plaza de Toros - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Pontevedra Marina - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Ruins of Santo Domingo Church - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Pontevedra Town Hall - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Basilica Santa Maria - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Teatro Principal - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Praza de la Pelegrina - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Santuario de la Peregrina - 7 km / 4.3 mi
San Francisco Church - 7 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Villa Covelo is Vigo (VGO-Peinador) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Husa Villa Covelo is Vigo (VGO-Peinador) - 23 km / 14.3 mi.
